Class Tile

java.lang.Object
Tile
public class Tile extends Object
This is the Tile class for the farming simulator game for MCO2.

Methods include tile actions in the game; checking if seed can be planted, adding and removing rocks, plowing the tile, planting a seed, removing crop, retrieving crop, getting tile information, and getting the crop of the tile.

  • Method Details

    • canPlant

      public boolean canPlant(Tile[] farmLot, Seed seed, int index)
      Checks whether a tile is plantable or not.
      Parameters:
      farmLot - the farmlot to be planted on
      seed - the seed to be planted
      index - the index of the tile to be planted on
      Returns:
      true if the seed can be planted on the tile, otherwise false

    • addRock

      public void addRock()
      Adds rock on tile.

    • removeRock

      public boolean removeRock()
      Removes rock on tile.
      Returns:
      true if tile has rock, false if otherwise

    • plowTile

      public boolean plowTile()
      Plows the tile.
      Returns:
      true if tile is unplowed, false if otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the crop that was removed
